briefdescription.para: Inherit construction from the Matrix class, but also set the booleans.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned long xval, unsigned long yval, long xwrap, long ywrap)

briefdescription.para: Returns the value at the x,y position. This is used for testing purposes only.

the y coordinate
the x wrapping
the y wrapping

memberdef.name: getMaskVal

briefdescription.para: Returns the value at the x,y position, with the given x and y wrap. Also checks whether or not the map is set to null, or whether the value comes from within a fragment.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate.
the y coordinate
the x wrapping
the y wrapping

briefdescription.para: Set the fragment for the samplemask to some calculated fragment. This can be set multiple times.

parameterdescription.para: the Fragment to set the samplemask to.

briefdescription.para: Removes the fragment.
Returns if the simulation is using the a null samplemask, and therefore does not need to store the full sample grid in memory.

simplesect.para: true if using a null samplemask

briefdescription.para: Sets the parameters for the datamask, including the dimensions of the map, the offsets from the grid and the dimensions of the grid itself for recalculating coordinates.

parameterdescription.para: Simulation parameter to set the data mask from

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned long xdim, unsigned long ydim, unsigned long mask_xdim, unsigned long mask_ydim, unsigned long xoffset, unsigned long yoffset, string inputfile_in)
memberdef.name: importBooleanMask

briefdescription.para: Imports the sample mask as a boolean mask and sets the relevant sample mask dimensions. Should only be called if the import is actually required (i.e. the map is not null or none).

parameterdescription.para: the x dimension of the grid area
the y dimension of the grid area
the x dimension of the sample map file
the y dimension of the sample map file
the x offset of the grid area from the sample map file
the y offset of the grid area from the sample map file
the path to the sample map file

briefdescription.para: Imports the boolean map object.
Sets the map dimensions and the getVal function pointer.
Sets up the null sampling map.
Imports the specified file for the sampling percentage within each cell.

detaileddescription.para:
The map should consist of floating points representing the relative sampling rates in each cell. Note that the actual sampling proportion is equal to the cell value multiplied by global deme sampling proportion.
mapvarin
the SimParameters object containing the samplemask file location and dimensions

memberdef.argsstring: (const long &x, const long &y, const long &xwrap, const long &ywrap)
memberdef.name: getVal

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix value at the provided x, y location. If everywhere is sampled, simply returns true, as no sample_mask will be stored in memory. This is to save RAM where possible.

parameterdescription.para: the x position on the grid
the y position on the grid
the number of x wraps
the number of y wraps

simplesect.para: the sample_mask value at x,y (or true if the file was "null")

memberdef.argsstring: (const long &x, const long &y, const long &xwrap, const long &ywrap)

briefdescription.para: Returns the exact value from the spatial sampling map, for calculating the proportion of individuals to be sampled in each cell.

the y position on the grid

the number of y wraps around the map

the proportion of individuals to sample
the generation individuals are added at

memberdef.name: fptr

detaileddescription.para: A binary grid telling whether or not the cell should be sampled.
Exact grid for determining sampling proportion.

briefdescription.para: A child of the Matrix class as booleans. Used for determining where to sample species from.
